name: Space Trouble (GeriBP, gults34, Helena Tanco Garcia)
name_original: Space Trouble (GeriBP, gults34, Helena Tanco Garcia)
description:
Space Trouble is a local multiplayer game where the players take control of a crew of up to 5 clumsy astronauts that need to keep repairing their broken spaceship  before it breaks apart.

This game was made during the Barcelona Global Game Jam 2020 which theme  was"Repair". Credits:

Gerard Belenguer - Programmer / Graphics

Andrés Vázquez - Programmer

Helena Tanco - Artist / Programmer / UI

Martí Lloveras - Music and Sfx

*The game is playable in the browser but the Windows version works better (link down below)
